meanings.definition: Valkyries: female figures in Norse mythology who choose those who may die in battle and those who may live
meanings.sent1: In Norse mythology, valkyries decide the fate of warriors in battle.
meanings.sent2: The valkyries selected the bravest warriors to join Odin in Valhalla.
meanings.sent3: The valkyries had a tough job deciding who would win the battle of the bands.
meanings.sent4: The valkyries were like ethereal judges, determining the outcome of the battle.
meanings.sent5: The valkyries' presence on the battlefield was both fearsome and awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: Valkyries: a group of female warriors in Norse mythology who serve Odin and escort the souls of fallen warriors to Valhalla
meanings.sent1: Odin's valkyries were fierce warriors who guided fallen soldiers to Valhalla.
meanings.sent2: The valkyries rode their winged horses to escort fallen warriors to the afterlife.
meanings.sent3: The valkyries organized a welcoming party for the new arrivals in Valhalla.
meanings.sent4: The valkyries' loyalty to Odin was unwavering as they fulfilled their duty.
meanings.sent5: The image of valkyries soaring through the sky with fallen heroes was legendary.
